pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy | PrizePalace Casino & Hotel - Your Privacy and Data Protection PrizePalace Home Facilities Advantages Casino Suggestions Why are we Privacy Policy Welcome to PrizePalace, a premier casino hotel website based in the United Kingdom. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website or use our services. By using our website or services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you express an interest in obtaining information about us or our services, when you participate in activities on our website, or otherwise when you contact us. The personal information we collect may include your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information. We may also collect information about your preferences, such as your favorite casino games or hotel amenities. Automatically Collected Information When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the website, we may collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the website, and information about how you interact with the website. We refer to this automatically-collected information as "Device Information. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect or receive: To send you marketing and promotional communications. We and/or our third-party marketing partners may use the personal information you send to us for our marketing purposes if this is in accordance with your marketing preferences. You can opt-out of our marketing emails at any time. To send administrative information to you. We may use your personal information to send you a product, service, and new feature information and/or information about changes to our terms, conditions, and policies. To post testimonials. We post testimonials on our website that may contain personal information. Prior to posting a testimonial, we will obtain your consent to use your name and the content of the testimonial. If you wish to update or delete your testimonial, please contact us at prizepalace@gmail.com and be sure to include your name, testimonial location, and contact information. For other business purposes. We may use your information for other business purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns, and evaluating and improving our website, products, services, marketing, and your experience. PrizePalace © 2024 PrizePalace Casino & Hotel. All rights reserved. pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use | PrizePalace Casino & Hotel - Guidelines and Conditions PrizePalace Home Facilities Advantages Casino Suggestions Why are we Terms of Use Eligibility To use our services, you must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into contracts. Our services are intended for users residing in the United Kingdom. Account Registration To access certain features of our website, you may need to create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and restricting access to your computer. Website Content All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, and software, is the property of PrizePalace or its content suppliers and is protected by U.K. and international copyright laws. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, or distribution of the content is strictly prohibited. Online Gaming PrizePalace offers a variety of online casino games for entertainment purposes only. No real money is required to play the games, and no real money or prizes can be won. By using our gaming services, you acknowledge that you are not relying on any chance or skill-based outcome to receive any form of compensation. Hotel Booking Services Our website allows users to book rooms at our affiliated hotel properties. All bookings are subject to availability and the terms and conditions of the respective hotel. You are responsible for reviewing and understanding the hotel's policies before making a reservation. User Conduct You agree not to use our website for any unlawful or prohibited purpose. This includes, but is not limited to, using the website to harass, abuse, or harm other users; transmitting spam or unsolicited commercial emails; or interfering with the proper functioning of the website. Disclaimer of Warranties Our website and its content are provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, as to the operation of our website or the information, content, materials, or products included on our website. Limitation of Liability In no event shall PrizePalace, its affiliates, or their respective officers, directors, employees, or agents be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use our website. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Kingdom. Any legal action or proceeding arising out of or related to these Terms shall be instituted exclusively in the federal or state courts located in the United Kingdom. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at prizepalace@gmail.com. PrizePalace © 2024 PrizePalace Casino & Hotel. All rights reserved. pages.index: Welcome to PrizePalace Casino & Hotel - Your Ultimate Destination for Luxury and Excitement PrizePalace Home Facilities Advantages Casino Suggestions Why are we Welcome to PrizePalace Hotel Discover the perfect blend of luxury and excitement at PrizePalace Hotel. Nestled in the heart of the city, our hotel offers unparalleled comfort and top-notch amenities to ensure an unforgettable stay. Whether you're here for business or pleasure, PrizePalace is your ultimate destination for relaxation and entertainment.
